title: The British Royal couple to visit National Cricket Academy in Lahore
text:
The British Royal couple, Prince William and Kate Middleton, will visit National Cricket Academy (NCA) during their tour to Lahore on Thursday.

The chairman of Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Ehsan Mani and CEO Wasim Khan will welcome the honorable guests and will give them a tour of the cricket academy.

William and Kate will witness an exhibition match in the academy while they will distribute prizes among the cricketers.

Former Tes cricket and national team’s bowling coach Waqar Younis, Test batsman Azhar Ali, fast bowlers Hasan Ali and Shaheen Shah Afridi are invited to attend the prestigious function in the honor of Duke and Duchess of England.

Sana Mir and Urooj Mumtaz will be representing Pakistan women’s cricketers. William and Kate are scheduled to meet the cricketers to have a healthy discussion on the progress of cricket.
